title: How to Make Fruit Faces

steps.headline: Prepare the fruit.
steps.description: Cut a melon into circular slices. Peel the banana and mandarin (separated each segments. De-core and cut the apple into slices.

steps.headline: Get individual bowls and divide the mandarin, apple, banana, and grapes slices into each bowl.
Put a melon slice on a plate for each child.
Use the other fruit to create faces.

text:
Prepare the fruit. Cut a melon into circular slices. Peel the banana and mandarin (separated each segments. De-core and cut the apple into slices. Get individual bowls and divide the mandarin, apple, banana, and grapes slices into each bowl. Put a melon slice on a plate for each child. Use the other fruit to create faces. Use the mandarin as a mouth and hair. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Make-Fruit-Faces-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Fruit-Faces-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Make-Fruit-Faces-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-Fruit-Faces-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"
